website_summaries.verdict: Results on your soil test aren't instant, but they will give you a very good accuracy level.
pros: Just take soil sample using tools included in kit and send in for testing
Extensive results give you the information you need to  add the right amount of fertilizer and other nutrients to your soil
cons: Takes at least a week to receive results

customer_reviews.title: No Response, Zero Value
customer_reviews.text: I sent two samples, followed instructions exactly and got nothing. I've used them before and been pleased with the results, but there is absolutely no tracking system to know when they lose your sample.
customer_reviews.author: C. M.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Wish I bought this sooner! Was fighting a yard that was slowly thinning. Checked it was getting enough water, sunlight, no bugs, etc. Finally gave this a try, really fast results when you mail it in. Gave the PDF results to my lawn guy, they treated it based on the results (was really low on potash) and a week later the yard was much thicker. Neighbors came out asking what I did differently (they see me outside working on the yard alot). Told them about this and will use this again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Ripped off
customer_reviews.text: Ordered whitetail institute soil test kit. Fallowed every step on the box and I got no results back. I waited a week before calling, but no one answered the automated recording. Waited probably 1 hour then just hung up. Extremely disappointed with whitetail institute right now. I Do not recommend this product it’s just a wast of money on your part because whitetail institute is too unorganized to help with issues or complications might pop up. So basically it’s a crap shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is very easy to use and I got my results emailed to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to use and I got my results emailed to me quickly. They actually let you put down what crop you want to grow and they make a suggestion for soil improvement for that crop based on the results. I wanted to plant blackberry and they told me my soil was fine and I didn't need to do anything.
customer_reviews.author: 1vitruvianman

customer_reviews.title: The report is extensive and worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Got the results back, my only complaint I had to contact them to get the report. The report is extensive and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KayakWesty

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sent in 2 sample kits and never got our results back.
customer_reviews.author: J-Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Test Kit
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed and am excited to make use of it later this year. Looking forward to getting the resilts and planting whitetail institute products based on those results. I plan get another sample next year to see if the work and additives to the soil have made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never received results
customer_reviews.text: Tried to test my soil for food plots. I never received any results back I followed all directions. It's been 3 or 4 months now. I definitely will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Tyler Shuman

customer_reviews.title: Results
customer_reviews.text: Followed directions, sent sample in, I think the actual address had an extra T in the street name. I didn't initially get any results, but I went to their website and sent an email and they responded within a day with the results. Working on figuring out what I need to do now.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: YOU HAVE TO DO A SOIL TEST OR YOU ARE WASTING TIME AND MONEY
customer_reviews.text: If you are doing food plots, you have to do a soil test or you are throwing money away. This is the simplest way to do it. Buy the kit, mail it in (my cost was another $9-10 to mail at post office) and receive results quick. This is extremely convenient as if you are planting their products, they know the exact amount of lime, fertilizer, etc.. to give you the best crop for your animals to maximize the forage you are trying to provide.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very slow results
customer_reviews.text: Sent is the sample 6 weeks ago and still no results. Even optioned for the quicker email response
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother.
customer_reviews.text: Not very satisfied. Sent in kit 2 months ago and nothing back.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew finch

customer_reviews.title: Soil test
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, fill the bag send it in, and a day after they receive it they email you an easy chart to read with would ph’s and required fertilizer needed for your food plot. Well worth the money spend on test for optimal food plot growth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use kit with impressive results
customer_reviews.text: Comes as a complete kit with clearly written easy to follow directions. The enclosed priority envelope is nice. I sent my sample on a Friday and had the results in about 3 days, not bad. Results were very detailed and through with suggestions on soil improvements. Very impressed, I will definitely be purchasing another in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Easy, fast, efficient results. All at a fair price, about the same as taking to local ag center, and all I have to do is mail it in, results are emailed to me. I also like that I have every year for the past 6 years soil analysis on my PC.
customer_reviews.author: G Clowers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty simple
customer_reviews.text: Renovating front and backyard with a hybrid Bermuda, ordered 2 test kits, arrived in the time frame estimated, simple to use, sent them out and estimated delivery was the 14th, was emailed results by 8a.m the 15th. Wish there was a bit more info in the results. But over all happy
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Great for Whitetail Institute users
customer_reviews.text: Excellent report for product-specific soil recommendations. If you aren't planning on using Whitetail Institute products, you'll have to do more research to figure out what's required for your desired planting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soil test kit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for 15 year old grandson to help him determine which soil amendments he’d need for his new garden.
customer_reviews.author: rivergrl08

customer_reviews.title: Unable to find fertilizer recommended and employee could not help when I called
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 soil test kits to determine what amendments might be needed for flower bed, lawn and a hill. The soil analysis arrived with recommendations for additives for acres rather than a suburban lot. When I tried to find a fertilizer with the recommended proportions of Nitrogen, Phosphorus and Potassium, I could not find one at a store near me. I called the Whitetail Institute and was told to go to a feed and grain store but there is none locally. I am disappointed in the information provided as I spent money for information that I can not use.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Unusable Results
customer_reviews.text: Sent a sample from under a Spruce Tree where the grass refuses to grow. Tried four times to get the grass to grow. Made a note on the form explaining my problem. The report did not help at all in determining why.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: No response from agency
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product, found it easy to use and the instructions for sending easy to follow: I spent $18.00 to send to the agency indicated on the product and have as of 6 weeks heard nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Ferrell Neal

customer_reviews.title: Soil test for Lawn
customer_reviews.text: I reached out to the company to confirm this test was good for soil for my lawn. I was give. Instructions that were very easy, I mailed in my soil and had results within 24 hours from the time they received my soil. I put down the fertilizer and lime and my lawn is starting to look great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen L.

customer_reviews.title: If you want to know what your nutrients your fields ...
customer_reviews.text: If you want to know what your nutrients your fields are lacking, and the ph levels this is the way to go, Very detailed report, and after you send it in you can have the results sent by email the day after it arrives at the Whitetail Institute located in Alabama. I only use WI for all my soil testing needs because of its accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Fire1

customer_reviews.title: A must for any food plot
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and professional advice with a phone call. WTI is the best to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: James Webster

customer_reviews.title: Quick results read instructions before getting samples
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as advertised. Only issue is you have to tell them which seed they sell you are going to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Very helpful. Fast results. Would use again
customer_reviews.author: James Cantalini

customer_reviews.title: Great service and information...
customer_reviews.text: Great service. Used them to get soil composition of my front lawn. Results came back via e-mail in less than a week. The recommendation was easy to follow. Will definitely use again.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: A must if you are doing a food plot
customer_reviews.text: Awesome test package. Company gets right back to you with results. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Jock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and report on time.
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine, the report was emailed on time and gave me the information I was looking for. No problem..
customer_reviews.author: MGL0120

customer_reviews.title: Fast results
customer_reviews.text: I sent my sample off on Monday and had the results back via email on Friday. I would highly recommend if you are planting a food plot.
customer_reviews.author: Harris lasecki

customer_reviews.title: Not what i thought it was
customer_reviews.text: `Wanted small garden and small yard test kit, too much for me.. Have to send off to others.
customer_reviews.author: sid B.

customer_reviews.title: Fast results
customer_reviews.text: Easy instructions. Results were emailed within 24 hours of receiving my sample.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie M.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Have used before and I get a detailed report on what my soil needs.
customer_reviews.author: diamond dave

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Four days after I mailed the soil sample I had an email with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Onahunch

customer_reviews.title: Don’t skip this step; how many fall hunting seasons can you waste? Are you serious or not: it’s 13 bucks...buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Is easy to do and you get quick answers. It tells you how much fertilizer you need and what is sold in your area!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never received results back.
customer_reviews.text: Sent in the test kit, never got results back via mail or email.
customer_reviews.author: Sam F

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive in advertising the product.
customer_reviews.text: I did not know that it is required to mail a sample to obtain results. The add was not very clear on that.
customer_reviews.author: Glee

customer_reviews.title: Quick turn around!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Extremely quick turn around on the soil results.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Product!! Well worth the investment. Mine only took about 3 days to arrive after I sent it off. SUPER EASY PROCESS!! DO IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: A must use
customer_reviews.text: Takes only a couple days to have easy to read and understand results
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for food plots
customer_reviews.text: Liked it for spreading food plot seed. Easy to use and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to do and send out but never received our results.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got my resauts back lighting fast. Less than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One soil sample per kit.
customer_reviews.text: If you have multiple food plots and plan to do soil samples for each one, you must buy a kit for each plot. So therefore, you're spending near $50 just to sample 5 plots. Not doubting this product and their feedback but they could do a much better job stating this product is just for one soil sample. I sent this product back after discovering that and already purchased a new product that will sample up to 4 plots for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Quick turnaround time
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were simple to follow. I mailed the samples on a Monday and on Thursday my results were emailed to me.
customer_reviews.author: Casey B.

customer_reviews.title: I am beyond annoyed. Can’t contact them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered th kit. Put my samples in. Mailed in their bag. Nearly TWO months later I don’t have anything. I am beyond annoyed. Can’t contact them. Unbelievable! Stay away
customer_reviews.author: Pet Lover

customer_reviews.title: Know for Sure
customer_reviews.text: This is a convenient and quick way to know exactly what you need for whatever you're growing. I followed the instructions and was told via email (you can choose email or paper) that I was to put 4.5lbs 30-30-30 for their Fusion mix. I paid $9.45 for postage which was more than I expected and may vary from state to state.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: No more Guessing !
customer_reviews.text: Can really tell the difference in food plots we have guessed at and the ones we had this soil test done and followed the directions. We put in 14 food plots here on our ranch, we don't guess anymore we soil test and then hope for rain !
customer_reviews.author: Garry W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and understand results and recommendations
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't get much easier than this. Fill bag, mail it, get your results via email in a few days. Easy to read and understand results and recommendations.
customer_reviews.author: batesfusion

customer_reviews.title: This test kit makes it so easy to determine what your soil needs for growing healthy ...
customer_reviews.text: This test kit makes it so easy to determine what your soil needs for growing healthy and strong food plots. And the report you receive is quite thorough. We will definitely use them again!
customer_reviews.author: flapsnapski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The results are very detailed and they emailed them very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Freeman II

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Report was very detailed and easy to use. Results are sent via email too.
customer_reviews.author: Big Stinky

customer_reviews.title: Also the submittal form was not highlighted like the other 2
customer_reviews.text: Product was shipped fast as expected when using prime. 2 out of the 3 soil test kits were complete, however the 3rd test kit did not contain the bag required to send to the lab. Also the submittal form was not highlighted like the other 2. I spoke with whitetail institute and they could not promise me that the 3rd sample (sent in in paper bags with the miss-matched form) could be processed
customer_reviews.author: Daniel F.

customer_reviews.title: Will do as they recommend, we'll see
customer_reviews.text: A little late . Will do as they recommend, we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Yakaitis

customer_reviews.title: ... be able to use the info to have a better garden next year
customer_reviews.text: i guess i thought i would be able to use the info to have a better garden next year. no such luck. really a waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected. Just some bags to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected. Just some bags to put soil in to mail off to a lab. I was really hoping to find something with a self ph test instead of relying on a lab.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Q

customer_reviews.title: and most like will discard this entire package
customer_reviews.text: My fault - should have read description of item more closely. I was not expecting to have to mail a single dirt sample to somewhere else, and most like will discard this entire package. No sense in wasting more money paying to mail dirt. I wanted a Kit to test in-situ for acidity. The description should read "Mail In Soil Test Kit".
customer_reviews.author: Dewey A.

product_meta.title: Whitetail Institute Laboratory Soil Test Kit - Ensures The Most Successful Deer Food Plot Possible - Professional Consultation Included, Receive Results Within One Week, 1, Model Number: STK
product_meta.description: Size:1Ensure the most successful food plot possible and save money with Whitetail Institute Soil Test Kits. Testing your soil is the most important step for ensuring food plot success. Whitetail Institute’s Soil Test Kit tells you exactly how much lime and fertilizer is needed for optimum results and makes sure you don’t buy more than you need.
feature_bullets: Ensure the most attractive, nutritious and productive food plot possible
Saves you money by avoiding unnecessary fertilizer and lime purchases
Results by mail or email within one week

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars190 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
